author: Tyler Mathieson
title: Individuals wanted for burglary, fraud, escape and more on Campbell County's Most Wanted | News | newscenter1.tv
text: GILLETTE, WY - Crimestoppers of Gillette works closely with local law enforcement to assist in information gathering that the public might be reluctant to share directly with law enforcement. Information that that they are given that can lead to an arrest can be eligible for up to a $1,000 reward. If you have any information about the individuals below, please contact Crimestoppers of Gillette at (307) 228-4276 or your local law enforcement agency. Periodically, Crimestoppers of Gillette, in conjunction with local law enforcement publishes a "Most Wanted List" for Campbell County. Here is their most recent wanted list. Campbell County's Most Wanted December 2023 Campbell County Most Wanted - Christopher GreenUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Cody Marie OdenUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Daniel KubicaUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Isaiah FleckUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Glen BeltUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Kirk JohnsonUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Mandi BrunoUpdated Campbell County Most Wanted - Scott JordanUpdated Related: Below are eight featured crimes that law enforcement highlighted that they are asking for help with. Crime Stoppers of Gillette have created a [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/crimestoppersofgillette) to further connect with the community.
